message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think you'd really appreciate its value.  I'm asking for $100 for it.  What do you think?
Thanks for reaching out, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within $120. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $90?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to get closer to $100. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $95?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on $92 for the product?
